mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, grade, user_point, user_thumbnail_file_url, profile_description, reg_date, update_date, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userNickname}, #{grade}, #{userPoint}, #{userThumbnailFileUrl}, #{profileDescription}, #{regDate}, #{updateDate}, #{isDelete} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_idx, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_nickname, grade, user_point, user_thumbnail_file_url, profile_description, reg_date, update_date, is_delete FROM member WHERE user_idx = #{id}
